tasks.task: Secure transport and handling of pesticides
subtasks: Load pesticides into secure transport vehicles (truck bed, cargo area)
Inspect pesticide containers for leaks before loading and unloading
Protect pesticide containers from damage during transport (securely, prevent stacking, etc.)
Monitor pesticide containers during transport for any issues
Never leave pesticides unattended during transport
If possible, store pesticides in a locked area when not in use during transport

tasks.task: Secure transport and handling of pesticides.
Secure transport and handling of pesticides
MAINTASK: Secure transport and handling of pesticides
subtasks: Check pesticide containers for leaks before loading and unloading.
Protect containers from damage during transport (e.g., securing stacking, using covers).
Monitor containers for any issues during transport.
Never leave pesticides unattended during transport.
Store pesticides in a locked area when possible and feasible.
